sections.description: Display relevant statistics of all your private download links.
sections.changelog:
version 1.2.0

- Track PCP passwords

- Export passwords to CSV

version 1.1.0

- Track information of password protect entire site

- Track information of password CPT

- Check if PDA v2 or v3 is activated and license is valid before adding submenu

- Remove yme-plugin-update-checker lib

- Group by Files under Users' Protected Files Access

- Duplicate queries
